item.title: [RS2] Port Sarim: Rune Buyer Advance! [ ~ ]
item.dc:creator: @Surajd Surajd
item.description:
@Surajd wrote:

Hey all, here is my Port Sarim: Rune Buyer Advance

[CODE]//=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=
// Rune Buyer Advance for Port Sarim v1.01 by Surajd --FREE EDITION–
//=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=

//=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=
// This script is for Squig v2!
//=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=

//=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=
// Use Low Detail: 32-Bit Screen Reso: 1024x768 (Doesn’t Really Matter)
// Only for RS2, tested on RS2 Jagex Client and Internet Site maximised
// —> START INSIDE PORT SARIM RUNE SHOP ANYWHERE!!!
// —> Can only buy all the runes available to Free Players!
// —> Can only buy runes in 5’s so far just incase!
// —> SETUP LINES: 44-45
// All Anti-Randoms so far, will add more in my free time!
// Use with SCAR 2.03 only!

// Email me on tda_ldr@hotmail.com if you encounter and problems (Errors)
//=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=

//=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=

// Version History:
//
// v1.01 = Added option for all runes in Free Players only!
